item.title: Zelenskyy to meet with Trump after Putin talks end without a ceasefire
item.description: Zelenskyy said he and Trump would meet Monday to "discuss all of the details regarding ending the killing and the war."

item.title: FBI Director Patel and foundation win defamation lawsuit against blogger, awarded $250,000
item.description: Blogger Jim Stewartson accused Kash Patel of being a "Kremlin asset," of trying to overthrow the U.S. government, and of planning the Jan. 6, 2021, at...

item.title: Zelenskyy to travel to Washington on Monday for talks with Trump
item.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said he will meet U.S. President Donald Trump in Washington on Monday after a Russia-U.S. summit ended without...

item.title: Trump hails meeting with Putin as 'productive' after talks over Ukraine fail to reach a breakthrough
item.description: Following the Friday meeting Trump said, "There's no deal until there's a deal."

item.title: Trump says no imminent plans to penalize China for buying Russian oil
item.description: The president last week imposed an additional 25% tariff on Indian goods, citing its continued imports of Russian oil.
